transArray.content:
It's very convenient to stay here when I'm on a business trip. The location is great, the room is small, but the layout is compact and reasonable, and it's very comfortable~

The only thing I feel is that it would be more ideal to have a small bedside table next to the two beds in the standard room.

Thank you very much for your stay and leaving your valuable comments. We have been committed to creating a warm and sweet home for you. Your comfort is our highest pursuit. All staff look forward to your visit again
